title: The Bachelorette: Angie Kent's contestants exposed as 'secret actors'
text:
Angie Kent isn't the only person on The Bachelorette with a history in showbusiness.

But while she makes no secret of her past on Gogglebox and I'm A Celebrity, several of her contestants haven't been quite so honest about their previous starring roles.

Before appearing on the Channel 10 dating show, contestants such as Carlin Sterritt appeared in advertising campaigns and even movies.

Scroll down for video

Surprise! It turns out Angie Kent (pictured) isn't the only person on The Bachelorette with a history in showbusiness, as six of her contestants are either actors or models

Ahead of The Bachelorette premiere earlier this month, Carlin removed 'actor' from his Instagram bio and also deleted his Facebook fan page.

Carlin, who is billed as a 'personal trainer' on the show, also removed his StarNow profile, where he advertised his services to casting agents.

In recent years, he has starred in campaigns for menswear brand Tramps The Store and also appeared in short films like Red Zone, Divided and Graveyard Shift.

Furthermore, he has a lead role in the upcoming Australian drama Out of the Woods.

Hmm! Ahead of The Bachelorette premiere, Carlin removed 'actor' from his Instagram bio and also deleted his Facebook fan page. His fan page is still listed on Google, however

Screen star! In recent years, Carlin has starred in campaigns for menswear brand Tramps The Store and also appeared in short films. Pictured: Carlin in a Tramps The Store advert in 2019

He's a natural! The personal trainer (circled) has spent plenty of time on set over the years, and is referred to on IMDb as an 'actor auditioning for leading roles around the world'

'Carlin is an actor auditioning for leading roles around the world,' reads his still-active IMDb page.

'Carlin's career took a bright turn after a guest role appearance on NBC's pilot season of CAMP in 2013. Going forward to work on larger productions such as Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales.'

In addition to Carlin, former stripper Ciarran Stott also has an acting past, and lists himself as an 'actor, extra and model' on StarNow.

Last week, extraordinary footage emerged of Ciarran performing on stage at gay nightclub Throb in Darwin.

Coming soon! Carlin (left) has a lead role in the upcoming drama, Out of the Woods

Looking for work? Former stripper Ciarran Stott also has an acting past, and lists himself as an 'actor, extra and model' on StarNow (pictured)

He's not shy! Last week, extraordinary footage emerged of Ciarran performing on stage at gay nightclub Throb in Darwin. Pictured in January 2018

Meanwhile, Jamie Doran is said to be eyeing up a future in television too.

According to NW magazine, the 39-year-old firefighter told friends last year he was 'attending acting classes' in Sydney.

It is unclear if Jamie has starred in any productions yet.

Ho, ho, ho! In 2017, Ciarran (left) starred in a Christmas-themed gay stage show called Freez'n

Coming to a movie soon? According to NW magazine on Monday, Jamie Doran (pictured) told friends last year he was 'attending acting classes' in Sydney

Matt Whyatt may have told Angie of his adventurous career as a BMX rider during the first cocktail party, but he left off a couple of other achievements.

Matt is also a professional model, and was most recently the face of Superdry's latest collection in September.

He starred in the campaign alongside Love Island's Shelby Mills, YouTuber Kristine Fernandez and West African-born Australian rapper iiiCONIC.

Daily Mail Australia has contacted Channel 10 for comment.

Party boy! Professional BMX rider Matt Whyatt (pictured) is also a working model, and most recently appeared in a campaign for Superdry
description: Angie Kent isn't the only person on The Bachelorette with a history in showbusiness.
authors: Joshua Fox For Daily Mail Australia
